message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate the offer, but $140 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand you're on a budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $135 out of this deal. Can we discuss further?
